cause.description:
meet ian. ian is a 17 year old boy living in a world very different from yours. ian has a car, but doesnt have enough money for car insurance. for just $1 a day, you can give ian tha opportunity to pay his car insurance or blow your donation on quarter machines. think about how good you have it.
1. ian deserves your money.
2. canada's seal hunt must end immediately.
cause.mission: gwt ian some cash ta pay for his car insurance!
cause.name: give ian dougherty your support (and yer money!)
